Package com.advertisementproject.campaignservice.db.repository

Interface CampaignRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Campaign,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Campaign,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Campaign,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Campaign>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Campaign,​java.util.UUID>
@Repository
public interface CampaignRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Campaign,​java.util.UUID>
Repository for managing the campaign table in the database. Includes some custom methods beyond typical CRUD.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteByCompanyUserId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
    Deletes all campaigns with the supplied company id

    Retrieve all campaigns from the database for a specific company id
    java.util.List<Campaign> findAllByIsPublishedTrue()
    Retrieve all campaigns that are published, in other words where isPublished == true
    int publishScheduledCampaigns​(java.time.Instant instant)
    Sets isPublished = true for campaigns that have a publishedAt timestamp in the past and that are not already set to published.
    int removeExpiredCampaigns​(java.time.Instant instant)
    Removes all campaigns that have a expiredAt timestamp in the past.

    count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findById, save

  • Method Details

    • findAllByCompanyUserId

      java.util.List<Campaign> findAllByCompanyUserId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
      Retrieve all campaigns from the database for a specific company id
      Parameters:
      companyId - the company id to retrieve campaigns from
      Returns:
      list of campaigns with the supplied company id

    • deleteByCompanyUserId

      void deleteByCompanyUserId​(java.util.UUID companyId)
      Deletes all campaigns with the supplied company id
      Parameters:
      companyId - the company id for which to delete campaigns

    • findAllByIsPublishedTrue

      java.util.List<Campaign> findAllByIsPublishedTrue()
      Retrieve all campaigns that are published, in other words where isPublished == true
      Returns:
      list of all published campaigns

    • publishScheduledCampaigns

      @Transactional @Modifying @Query("UPDATE Campaign campaign SET campaign.isPublished = true WHERE campaign.isPublished = false AND campaign.publishedAt < ?1") int publishScheduledCampaigns​(java.time.Instant instant)
      Sets isPublished = true for campaigns that have a publishedAt timestamp in the past and that are not already set to published. This is run as a scheduled job in ScheduledJobsService.
      Parameters:
      instant - a timestamp for which to compare the publishedAt timestamp. Normally set to Instant.now()
      Returns:
      the number of campaigns that were set to published

    • removeExpiredCampaigns

      @Transactional @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM Campaign campaign WHERE campaign.expiresAt < ?1") int removeExpiredCampaigns​(java.time.Instant instant)
      Removes all campaigns that have a expiredAt timestamp in the past. This is run as a scheduled job in ScheduledJobsService.
      Parameters:
      instant - a timestamp for which to compare the expiredAt timestamp. Normally set to Instant.now()
      Returns:
      the number of expired campaigns that were removed
